title: kit tools
author: JiuYan
txt_content:
请问/kit tools 指令中领取的物品怎么修改
并且只能领取一次

replies.author: SILY
replies.txt_content: essentials插件的文件夹内有个config 按ctrl+f输入kit tools 在附近有选项是选择领取CD的 求采纳！！！！！

replies.author: MRTangwin8
replies.txt_content:
请使用kit essentials插件
每条命（ID）只可领取一次
http://tieba.baidu.com/p/3049520654
